description.narrative:
Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement.
JS Proputec has with the project boosted its strategic objective of pursuing business opportunities in developing countries and with this project in Morocco. With great support from the Danish Embassy in Rabat, the following immediate results have been achieved: 1)Successful development of a go to market plan and 2) Screening of relevant local firms to address and how to access, developed in consultation with TC in Rabat and has 5) successfully approached a number of local firms.

JS Proputec A/S plans to engage itself strategically in Morocco as the country presently is the 17th largest fishing industry. With a country strategy of becoming among the 10 largest, JS views the market as increasing in importance and with relatively easy access from Denmark, a good starting point on the African Continent
